amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the National Security Council and Homeland Security Council Salaries and Expenses by $2 million and increases funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas (HIDTA) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 58 printed in House Report 114-639 to increase funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas (HIDTA) by $2 million with an offset.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jenkins (WV) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Jenkins (WV).
